messages.message:
Yea, it took 12 secs for me. And jaegar returns 404 for the query :sigh:
I'm not sure why this takes a while without looking deeper into jaegar. cc @Jeff
I'll look into why this is render blocking tho.

Call chain `useShowSearch -> useSearchableDataSources -> useOrganizationDataSources`

And `useShowSearch` is used in `HomePageRefreshLanding` and it is render blocking

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/303c59fd70c6a6b914793886b79d0c9c3ef5e3[â€¦]d/apps/src/aihub/pages/Landing/HomePageRefreshLanding/index.tsx (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/303c59fd70c6a6b914793886b79d0c9c3ef5e328/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/pages/Landing/HomePageRefreshLanding/index.tsx#L122-L124)
I think we need to make it not blocking. This endpoint is expected to take a while.

should we just move that check into `renderForSearchAppEnabled` / `renderForSearchAppDisabled` ? for example, something like this:

```isShowSearchLoading
  ? <DivCenteredSpinner size={40} />
  : (
      showSearch
      ? welcomeMessage :
      : <SearchBarBanner />
    )```
I tried again now and the response time is around 4s. Maybe the slowness comes from deployment? (9am PST deployment is still in-progress now)
